member.name: T:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage
member.summary: CachedImage - Xamarin.Forms image replacement with caching and downsampling capabilities

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.IsLoading
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is loading.
member.value: true if this instance is loading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.IsOpaque
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is opaque.
member.value: true if this instance is opaque; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.RetryCount
member.summary: If image loading fails automatically retry it a number of times, with a specific delay. Sets number of retries.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.RetryDelay
member.summary: If image loading fails automatically retry it a number of times, with a specific delay. Sets delay in milliseconds between each trial

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleWidth
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Optional DownsampleWidth parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this width while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleHeight
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Optional DownsampleHeight parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this height while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.CacheDuration
member.summary: How long the file will be cached on disk.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.TransparencyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if the transparency channel should be loaded. By default this value comes from ImageService.Config.LoadWithTransparencyChannel.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.FadeAnimationEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if the fade animation effect should be enabled. By default this value comes from ImageService.Config.FadeAnimationEnabled.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.LoadingPlaceholder
member.summary: Gets or sets the loading placeholder image.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.ErrorPlaceholder
member.summary: Gets or sets the error placeholder image.
